creator: lucas@gonze.com
text:
The XSPF playlist format uses the extension .xspf and content type
application/xspf.xml.

Your URL points to a draft that claims to expire in 2005.  Google fails to 
find any reference to the type being registered, or even in process of 
registration, at IANA.  Please clarify.
creator: nick@webthing.com
